pageTitle: LOSING MILLIONS NOW A SACKABLE OFFENCE | Daily Telegraph Tim Blair Blog
textBeforeTable: Daily Telegraph Blogs – Talk to your journalists close  x thanks http://blogs.news.com.au/dailytelegraph/timblair/index.php/dailytelegraph/comments/losing_millions_now_a_sackable_offence/ The full post with comments is available at: Interesting that Greenpeace is so unforgiving when their own cash is at stake. Everyone’s a right-winger on their home turf. Greenpeace has fired an employee who lost the environmental charity $5.47 million in a failed gamble on international currency markets. Businesses lose millions every year due to the antics of Greenpeace and other environmental protest groups. But look what happens when Greenpeace itself falls victim to Greenpeace stupidity: Tuesday, June 17, 2014 LOSING MILLIONS NOW A SACKABLE OFFENCE Your friend has suggested you might be interested in this blog post:  Message: Subject: Recipient's Email:* Your Email:* Your Name:*
